item.title: Is it a bird? Is it a plane?
item.author: Felix Editor,Amy Whistlecroft,
item.description: How long can you stay in the air without an engine? In a glider, anything is possible. On a fresh Sunday morning in November, eight members of the Imperial College Gliding Club, both new and experienced, set off on an expedition to a new airfield. Meeting at university at 6:30am on a Sunday was a â€¦
